activities.loc: Br 3 - Law Enforcement Center - North Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Thomas Antonio Allison

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 2, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Emailed dispatch at 3:38 PM to vacate warrant.

Defendant appeared in person in court on 10/11/2022 to notify Judge Martinez that he was in treatment on the date he missed court and provides documentation. Per Judge Martinez, vacate warrant and reinstate bond.
Warrant/capias/commitment entered into all three systems and forwarded to RCSO/Dispatch
Warrant forwarded to JP for entry.

Bond forfeiture notice -
     Order forfeiting bail and notice of application for judgment. Missed court 10/3/2022. $500 signature bond requested/ordered forfeited.

2:10 PM Defendant Thomas Antonio Allison not in court.  Attorney William Demet for Attorney Elizabeth Martha Angove in court for Thomas Antonio Allison.  Attorney Jennifer Flynn in court for State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter Donna Moore. 
Matter scheduled as a status conference. 
Defendant does not appear. 
Defense makes statements on the record. 
BTC: No appearance, Bench Warrant requested/ordered, bond forfeited.
Status conference on October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:32 PM Defendant Thomas Antonio Allison in court, in custody.  Attorney Jennifer Flynn in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Natalie Probst for Attorney Elizabeth Martha Angove in court for Thomas Antonio Allison. 
Defense needs another date to allow Attorney of record to be present. 
BTC: Matter set over.
Status conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
State's NOI to Introduce Certd Public Records
DA AUTHORIZATION TO OBTAIN COPIES OF CERTAIN EVIDENCE

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit. Do not drive unless properly licensed.

2:19 PM Prosecuting attorney John M Wagner in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Thomas Antonio Allison in court.  Attorney Elizabeth Martha Angove in court for Thomas Antonio Allison. Court Reporter Mark Garvin. 
Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.
Status conference scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on August 16, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Initial appearance on July 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
